title: 8. A Playbook for Beating the Next Pandemic
description: We dig into why Covid-19 caught us so unprepared and how we can make sure we’re ready for a future public-health crisis with former FDA director Scott Gottlieb.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: We dig into why Covid-19 caught us so unprepared and how we can make sure we’re ready for a future public-health crisis with former FDA director Scott Gottlieb.
